Kuhn discusses beliefs in terms of paradigms. In the sense referred to here a paradigm can be defined as a communal belief system with shared obligations to values and other symbolic generalisations.
The qualitative data from the interviews were coded according to the number of the interview, the interviewer’s initials and the name of the community.
